page.title: 20A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: In the morning I get up, have my breakfast and put on my school uniform. When I get to school I play cricket till 09.00. We have a daily assembly and then we have R.E. and English until playtime at 10.30. We usually do Maths. until dinner time at 12.10. After dinner I play outside. In the afternoon we work on topics and enjoy music and art, with a playtime at 14.15. The afternoon usually finishes with a class story. I go home at 15.25 on the bus to Middleton. When I get home I tell my mum what I have done at school and she tells me what she has done. I sit down and watch television and when my brother comes home from his school in Bakewell we have tea. I go out to play until 18.00. I watch television before I go to bed. Darrell Wilkinson (10)
